name: Lightball Jump: The Coin Collector of the Darkness
name_original: Lightball Jump: The Coin Collector of the Darkness
description:
Lightball Jump: The Coin Collector of the Darkness V2.5 currently is includes 9 challenging level that will help you learn the game and play in the next versions coming soon....

Instructions:

W--------up 

S--------down

A--------left

D-------right
